value.title: StarCraft 2: THE ULTIMATE LATE GAME! (Neeb vs Scarlett)
value.excerpt: Professional best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2. In this series of games between Neeb and Scarlett we have a variety of strategies. From an epic late game match, to cheesy mind games with Carriers into a Base Race between the Protoss and the Zerg player.  Get more videos & support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
